name: NSPasteboardReading
desc: A set of methods that defines the interface for initializing an object from a pasteboard.

items.name: init?(pasteboardPropertyList: Any, ofType: NSPasteboard.PasteboardType)
items.desc: Initializes an instance with a property list object and a type string.

items.name: static func readableTypes(for: NSPasteboard) -> [NSPasteboard.PasteboardType]
items.desc: Returns an array of UTI strings of data types the receiver can read from the pasteboard and be initialized from.

items.name: static func readingOptions(forType: NSPasteboard.PasteboardType, pasteboard: NSPasteboard) -> NSPasteboard.ReadingOptions
items.desc: Returns options for reading data of a specified type from a given pasteboard.

items.name: struct NSPasteboard.ReadingOptions
items.desc: Options to specify how data on the pasteboard should be interpreted to initialize pasteboard data.
